attributes.action: Limit the top prize money of the National Lottery to £1,000,000 pounds per winner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The top winning prize money should be  limited to £1,000,000 (One million pounds) and not given as one large prize amount. Should the prize fund be, for example £23,000.000 on a particular weekly draw, further draws could be made making 22 other entrants eligable for a £1,000,000 win. This I feel would encourage more donations to be made towards the Lottery Fund due to the public being given more chances of becoming a millionair. One Million Pounds would assist any entrant to the Lottery and give them a better life style

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
